24e5dc01-c5aa-473a-9cf5-801d66df3801.title: Shogun
24e5dc01-c5aa-473a-9cf5-801d66df3801.author: James Clavell
24e5dc01-c5aa-473a-9cf5-801d66df3801.description: The story of “Shogun” centers on John Blackthorne, an English navigator shipwrecked in Japan. He becomes embroiled in the complex political dynamics of the region, navigating between two powerful daimyōs, Toranaga and Ishido. Blackthorne’s assimilation into Japanese culture and his evolving relationships, especially with the noblewoman Mariko, form a significant part of the narrative. The plot is further enriched by the depiction of feudal Japan’s political landscape, the conflict between Christian and non-Christian daimyōs, and the influence of European powers. The novel culminates in Toranaga’s rise to power and Blackthorne’s acceptance of his destiny in Japan.

5c8f3e7f-1d92-4e9f-b3ef-7f1d6c42ae1b.title: The Midnight Library
5c8f3e7f-1d92-4e9f-b3ef-7f1d6c42ae1b.author: Matt Haig
5c8f3e7f-1d92-4e9f-b3ef-7f1d6c42ae1b.description: Between life and death, there is a library. When Nora Seed finds herself in the Midnight Library, she has a chance to make things right. But things aren't always what she imagined they'd be, and soon her choices place the library and herself in extreme danger.

e8a9a3d7-47c6-4d63-a62c-8a493593e1bc.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
e8a9a3d7-47c6-4d63-a62c-8a493593e1bc.author: Delia Owens
e8a9a3d7-47c6-4d63-a62c-8a493593e1bc.description: Kya Clark, the 'Marsh Girl', is suspected of murder. When Chase Andrews is found dead, the locals immediately suspect Kya. But she is not what they say. Sensitive and intelligent, she has survived for years alone in the marsh that she calls home.

f8d1e9b0-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8a3e9b0d5f.title: The Vanishing Half
f8d1e9b0-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8a3e9b0d5f.author: Brit Bennett
f8d1e9b0-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8a3e9b0d5f.description: The Vignes twin sisters will always be identical. But after growing up together in a small, southern black community and running away at age sixteen, it's not just the shape of their daily lives that is different as adults, it's everything: their families, their communities, their racial identities.

3a6b9f7d-c8e9-4a9f-9b2d-4f8a3b9e0d6f.title: A Promised Land
3a6b9f7d-c8e9-4a9f-9b2d-4f8a3b9e0d6f.author: Barack Obama
3a6b9f7d-c8e9-4a9f-9b2d-4f8a3b9e0d6f.description: In the stirring, highly anticipated first volume of his presidential memoirs, Barack Obama tells the story of his improbable odyssey from young man searching for his identity to leader of the free world, describing in strikingly personal detail both his political education and the landmark moments of the first term of his historic presidency.

4b9e0d6f-2c9f-4a7d-b3e0-6f1a8b2c9f7d.title: Educated
4b9e0d6f-2c9f-4a7d-b3e0-6f1a8b2c9f7d.author: Tara Westover
4b9e0d6f-2c9f-4a7d-b3e0-6f1a8b2c9f7d.description: Born to survivalists in the mountains of Idaho, Tara Westover was seventeen the first time she set foot in a classroom. Her quest for knowledge transformed her, taking her over oceans and across continents, to Harvard and to Cambridge.

5f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d1-2c9f7e8a3d6b.title: The Silent Patient
5f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d1-2c9f7e8a3d6b.author: Alex Michaelides
5f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d1-2c9f7e8a3d6b.description: Alicia Berenson’s life is seemingly perfect. One evening her husband Gabriel returns home late from a fashion shoot, and Alicia shoots him five times in the face, and then never speaks another word.

5f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d9-2c9f7e8a3d6b.title: The Silent Patient
5f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d9-2c9f7e8a3d6b.author: Alex Michaelides
5f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d9-2c9f7e8a3d6b.description: Alicia Berenson’s life is seemingly perfect. One evening her husband Gabriel returns home late from a fashion shoot, and Alicia shoots him five times in the face, and then never speaks another word.

5f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d1-2c9f2e8a3d6b.title: The Silent Patient
5f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d1-2c9f2e8a3d6b.author: Alex Michaelides
5f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d1-2c9f2e8a3d6b.description: Alicia Berenson’s life is seemingly perfect. One evening her husband Gabriel returns home late from a fashion shoot, and Alicia shoots him five times in the face, and then never speaks another word.

6f2a9b0e-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-7e8a3b9e0d5f.title: Becoming
6f2a9b0e-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-7e8a3b9e0d5f.author: Michelle Obama
6f2a9b0e-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-7e8a3b9e0d5f.description: In a life filled with meaning and accomplishment, Michelle Obama has emerged as one of the most iconic and compelling women of our era. In her memoir, a work of deep reflection and mesmerizing storytelling, she invites readers into her world, chronicling the experiences that have shaped her—from her childhood on the South Side of Chicago to her years as an executive balancing the demands of motherhood and work, to her time spent at the world’s most famous address.

7e8a3d5f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8b2c9f7e8a.title: Normal People
7e8a3d5f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8b2c9f7e8a.author: Sally Rooney
7e8a3d5f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8b2c9f7e8a.description: Connell and Marianne grew up in the same small town in the west of Ireland, but the similarities end there. In school, Connell is popular and well-liked, while Marianne is a loner. But when the two strike up a conversation—awkward but electrifying—something life-changing begins.

8f3b9d6f-2c9f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8b2c9f7e8a.title: The Testaments
8f3b9d6f-2c9f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8b2c9f7e8a.author: Margaret Atwood
8f3b9d6f-2c9f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8b2c9f7e8a.description: Margaret Atwood’s sequel to The Handmaid’s Tale picks up the story more than fifteen years after Offred stepped into the unknown, with the explosive testaments of three female narrators from Gilead.

9e0d5f6b-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8b2c9f7e8a.title: The Water Dancer
9e0d5f6b-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8b2c9f7e8a.author: Ta-Nehisi Coates
9e0d5f6b-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-4a8b2c9f7e8a.description: Young Hiram Walker was born into bondage. When his mother was sold away, Hiram was robbed of all memory of her—but was gifted with a mysterious power. Years later, when Hiram almost drowns in a river, that same power saves his life.

0f2b3e9d-4a8c-4b0e-a9d1-8c4f7e8a3d5f.title: Anxious People
0f2b3e9d-4a8c-4b0e-a9d1-8c4f7e8a3d5f.author: Fredrik Backman
0f2b3e9d-4a8c-4b0e-a9d1-8c4f7e8a3d5f.description: A poignant, charming novel about a crime that never took place, a would-be bank robber who disappears into thin air, and eight extremely anxious strangers who find they have more in common than they ever imagined.

1f2a9b0e-4b8c-4a0d-9f1d-6e8a3b9f0d5c.title: The Guest List
1f2a9b0e-4b8c-4a0d-9f1d-6e8a3b9f0d5c.author: Lucy Foley
1f2a9b0e-4b8c-4a0d-9f1d-6e8a3b9f0d5c.description: On an island off the coast of Ireland, guests gather to celebrate two people joining their lives together as one. The wedding is perfect—but for one thing: someone ends up dead.

2e9a3d6f-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-7f8a2c9b5d6e.title: Little Fires Everywhere
2e9a3d6f-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-7f8a2c9b5d6e.author: Celeste Ng
2e9a3d6f-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-7f8a2c9b5d6e.description: In Shaker Heights, a placid, progressive suburb of Cleveland, everything is planned—from the layout of the winding roads to the colors of the houses. And no one embodies this spirit more than Elena Richardson, whose guiding principle is playing by the rules.

3d8b9f0e-4a2c-4b0e-a9d1-8c3f7e2a9d6b.title: The Dutch House
3d8b9f0e-4a2c-4b0e-a9d1-8c3f7e2a9d6b.author: Ann Patchett
3d8b9f0e-4a2c-4b0e-a9d1-8c3f7e2a9d6b.description: At the end of the Second World War, Cyril Conroy combines luck and a single canny investment to begin an enormous real estate empire, propelling his family from poverty to enormous wealth. His first order of business is to buy the Dutch House, a lavish estate in the suburbs of Philadelphia.

4e9a3d6f-2c9f-4b0e-a9d1-8f7a3c9b0d5e.title: Daisy Jones & The Six
4e9a3d6f-2c9f-4b0e-a9d1-8f7a3c9b0d5e.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
4e9a3d6f-2c9f-4b0e-a9d1-8f7a3c9b0d5e.description: Daisy is a girl coming of age in L.A. in the late '60s, sneaking into clubs on the Sunset Strip, sleeping with rock stars, and dreaming of singing at the Whisky a Go Go. The sex and drugs are thrilling, but it’s the rock and roll she loves most.

5f2b3e9a-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-7f8a2c9b0d5e.title: The Institute
5f2b3e9a-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-7f8a2c9b0d5e.author: Stephen King
5f2b3e9a-8c4f-4b0e-a9d1-7f8a2c9b0d5e.description: In the middle of the night, in a house on a quiet street in suburban Minneapolis, intruders silently murder Luke Ellis’s parents and load him into a black SUV. The operation takes less than two minutes.

6f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d1-2c9f7e8a3d6b.title: Such a Fun Age
6f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d1-2c9f7e8a3d6b.author: Kiley Reid
6f1a8b2c-9f7d-4b0e-a6d1-2c9f7e8a3d6b.description: Alix Chamberlain is a woman who gets what she wants and has made a living with her confidence-driven brand. She is shocked when her babysitter, Emira Tucker, is confronted while watching the Chamberlains’ toddler one night.

e3071f05-ebf3-4b34-b40c-10e4978e223e.name: Victor Von Doom
e3071f05-ebf3-4b34-b40c-10e4978e223e.body: I really enjoyed writing this comment here!

e3071f05-ebf3-4b24-b49c-10e4978e223e.name: Tony Hinchcliffe
e3071f05-ebf3-4b24-b49c-10e4978e223e.body: I really enjoyed writing this comment hered!

e3071f05-ebf3-4b24-b40c-10e4978e221e.name: Donald J Trump
e3071f05-ebf3-4b24-b40c-10e4978e221e.body: I really enjoyed writing this comment here!

e3041f05-ebf3-4b24-b40c-10e4978e223e.name: George W Bush
e3041f05-ebf3-4b24-b40c-10e4978e223e.body: I really enjoyed writing this comment here!
